views.markdown:
2.1.0 update -general fixes / improvements 0.2.2 -> 2.0

-quieter
-preference overhaul
-compatibility with springplus option
-support for custom toggle theme
0.2.2 fixes issues with icon on + model device Settings page

adds option to use random colours for your toggle background, enable in settings


0.2.1 enable/disable which toggles this tweak enables + adds compatibility with other internal toggle enablers

-you can choose which toggles you'd like enabled by this tweak
-if you leave them disabled, it will not show up unless you're using a different tweak to enable the toggle like CCLowPower or CCRecord
--Low Power mode now has a red enabled colour to help make it stand out
